useCase.name: Data Security and Compliance Report Generation

preconditions.precondition: The Funder requests security details for a specific project.

successEndConditions.condition: The Funder receives a report on data security and compliance.

useCase.trigger: The Funder initiates the process by requesting security details for a specific project.

mainSequence.step: The Funder requests security details for a specific project.
DMPTool assesses security measures and standards.
SecurityAssessmentModule fetches relevant data security protocols from ProjectData.
ProjectData returns security protocols to SecurityAssessmentModule.
SecurityAssessmentModule verifies compliance with legal standards using ComplianceDatabase.
ComplianceDatabase returns compliance status to SecurityAssessmentModule.
ReportGenerator compiles a security assessment report.
ReportGenerator generates and formats the report.
DMPTool provides the Funder with a report on data security and compliance.
